name: nativescript-calendar-weekview
description: Nativescript Calendar WeekView allow adding events to weekview and styling them.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../repeaterDemo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../repeaterDemo && tns plugin remove nativescript-calendar-weekview && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
